document_data.name: The Defenders Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Defenders Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Defenders''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: The Defenders were charged with the protection and defense of mighty [[Qudra]].
document_data.Organization: The Defenders were led by [[Akir Abd al-Himaya]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Since the defense of the city was the sole task, the Defenders were rarely encountered outside of her walls.
